AI Description: Psycopg is a popular PostgreSQL database adapter for the Python programming language. It provides a robust, efficient, and well-supported interface for interacting with PostgreSQL databases from Python applications.
Core Features: Allows Python Applications To Connect To & Interact With Postgresql Databases, Supports Various Postgresql Features Such As Server-Side Cursors & Asynchronous Communication, Facilitates Executing Sql Commands, Managing Transactions, & Fetching Query Results Efficiently, Provides A High Level Of Compatibility With Python Db-Api Specification For Database Programming, Offers Good Performance & Reliability For Database Operations
General Tags: Python Library, Database Adapter, Postgresql, Data Management
